name: Chat With Multiple Retrievers
description: Create, Curate, Communicate with Langflow. (Converted from Langflow Store for AxieStudio compatibility)

code.value:
from typing import Optional, Union

from langchain.llms import BaseLLM
from langchain_community.chat_models.openai import ChatOpenAI

from axiestudio import CustomComponent
from axiestudio.field_typing import BaseLanguageModel, NestedDict


class ChatOpenAIComponent(CustomComponent):
    display_name = "ChatOpenAI"
    description = "`OpenAI` Chat large language models API."

    def build_config(self):
        return {
            "max_tokens": {
                "display_name": "Max Tokens",
                "field_type": "int",
                "advanced": False,
                "required": False,
            },
            "model_kwargs": {
                "display_name": "Model Kwargs",
                "field_type": "NestedDict",
                "advanced": True,
                "required": False,
            },
            "model_name": {
                "display_name": "Model Name",
                "field_type": "str",
                "advanced": False,
                "required": False,
                "options": [
                    "gpt-4-turbo-preview",
                    "gpt-4-0125-preview",
                    "gpt-4-1106-preview",
                    "gpt-4-vision-preview",
                    "gpt-3.5-turbo-0125",
                    "gpt-3.5-turbo-1106",
                ],
            },
            "openai_api_base": {
                "display_name": "OpenAI API Base",
                "field_type": "str",
                "advanced": False,
                "required": False,
                "info": (
                    "The base URL of the OpenAI API. Defaults to https://api.openai.com/v1.\n\n"
                    "You can change this to use other APIs like JinaChat, LocalAI and Prem."
                ),
            },
            "openai_api_key": {
                "display_name": "OpenAI API Key",
                "field_type": "str",
                "advanced": False,
                "required": False,
                "password": True,
            },
            "temperature": {
                "display_name": "Temperature",
                "field_type": "float",
                "advanced": False,
                "required": False,
                "value": 0.7,
            },
        }

    def build(
        self,
        max_tokens: Optional[int] = 256,
        model_kwargs: NestedDict = {},
        model_name: str = "gpt-4-1106-preview",
        openai_api_base: Optional[str] = None,
        openai_api_key: Optional[str] = None,
        temperature: float = 0.7,
    ) -> Union[BaseLanguageModel, BaseLLM]:
        if not openai_api_base:
            openai_api_base = "https://api.openai.com/v1"
        return ChatOpenAI(
            max_tokens=max_tokens,
            model_kwargs=model_kwargs,
            model=model_name,
            base_url=openai_api_base,
            api_key=openai_api_key,
            temperature=temperature,
            streaming=True
        )
code.name: code

You can change this to use other APIs like JinaChat, LocalAI and Prem.

code.value:
from typing import Optional, Union

from langchain.schema import BaseRetriever
from langchain_community.vectorstores import VectorStore
from langchain_community.vectorstores.qdrant import Qdrant
from axiestudio import CustomComponent
from axiestudio.field_typing import Document, Embeddings, NestedDict
from elasticsearch import Elasticsearch
from langchain_elasticsearch import ElasticsearchStore


class BruceComponent(CustomComponent):
    display_name = "Bruce Inc. Vector Store & Retriever"
    description = "Um retriever diferente"

    def build_config(self):
        return {
            "documents": {"display_name": "Documents"},
            "embedding": {"display_name": "Embedding"},
            "api_key": {"display_name": "API Key", "password": True},
            "host": {"display_name": "Host"},
            "port": {"display_name": "Port"},
            "query_field": {"display_name": "Text Field"},
            "vector_query_field": {"display_name": "Dense Vector Field"}
        }

    def build(
        self,
        embedding: Embeddings,
        vector_query_field:str,
        query_field:str,
        index_name:str,
        documents: Optional[Document] = None,
        api_key: str = None,
        host: str = None,
        port: int = 9200,
        timeout: Optional[int] = 10,
        verify_certs:Optional[bool]=True
    ) -> Union[VectorStore, ElasticsearchStore, BaseRetriever]:

        client = Elasticsearch(
            hosts=f'{host}:{port}', 
            api_key=api_key,
            verify_certs=verify_certs,
            timeout=timeout
            )
        vs = ElasticsearchStore(
                es_connection=client, 
                index_name = index_name,
                embedding=embedding,
                vector_query_field=vector_query_field,
                query_field = query_field,
                strategy=ElasticsearchStore.ApproxRetrievalStrategy(hybrid=False)
                
            )
        return vs
code.name: code

code.value:
from typing import Any, Callable, Dict, List, Optional, Union

from langchain_openai.embeddings.base import OpenAIEmbeddings
from axiestudio import CustomComponent
from axiestudio.field_typing import NestedDict
from pydantic.v1.types import SecretStr


class OpenAIEmbeddingsComponent(CustomComponent):
    display_name = "OpenAIEmbeddings"
    description = "OpenAI embedding models"

    def build_config(self):
        return {
            "allowed_special": {
                "display_name": "Allowed Special",
                "advanced": True,
                "field_type": "str",
                "is_list": True,
            },
            "default_headers": {
                "display_name": "Default Headers",
                "advanced": True,
                "field_type": "dict",
            },
            "default_query": {
                "display_name": "Default Query",
                "advanced": True,
                "field_type": "NestedDict",
            },
            "disallowed_special": {
                "display_name": "Disallowed Special",
                "advanced": True,
                "field_type": "str",
                "is_list": True,
            },
            "chunk_size": {"display_name": "Chunk Size", "advanced": True},
            "client": {"display_name": "Client", "advanced": True},
            "deployment": {"display_name": "Deployment", "advanced": True},
            "embedding_ctx_length": {
                "display_name": "Embedding Context Length",
                "advanced": True,
            },
            "max_retries": {"display_name": "Max Retries", "advanced": True},
            "model": {
                "display_name": "Model",
                "advanced": False,
                "options": ["text-embedding-3-small", "text-embedding-3-large", "text-embedding-ada-002"],
            },
            "model_kwargs": {"display_name": "Model Kwargs", "advanced": True},
            "openai_api_base": {"display_name": "OpenAI API Base", "password": True, "advanced": True},
            "openai_api_key": {"display_name": "OpenAI API Key", "password": True},
            "openai_api_type": {"display_name": "OpenAI API Type", "advanced": True, "password": True},
            "openai_api_version": {
                "display_name": "OpenAI API Version",
                "advanced": True,
            },
            "openai_organization": {
                "display_name": "OpenAI Organization",
                "advanced": True,
            },
            "openai_proxy": {"display_name": "OpenAI Proxy", "advanced": True},
            "request_timeout": {"display_name": "Request Timeout", "advanced": True},
            "show_progress_bar": {
                "display_name": "Show Progress Bar",
                "advanced": True,
            },
            "skip_empty": {"display_name": "Skip Empty", "advanced": True},
            "tiktoken_model_name": {"display_name": "TikToken Model Name"},
            "tikToken_enable": {"display_name": "TikToken Enable", "advanced": True},
        }

    def build(
        self,
        default_headers: Optional[Dict[str, str]] = None,
        default_query: Optional[NestedDict] = {},
        allowed_special: List[str] = [],
        disallowed_special: List[str] = ["all"],
        chunk_size: int = 1000,
        client: Optional[Any] = None,
        deployment: str = "text-embedding-3-small",
        embedding_ctx_length: int = 8191,
        max_retries: int = 6,
        model: str = "text-embedding-3-small",
        model_kwargs: NestedDict = {},
        openai_api_base: Optional[str] = None,
        openai_api_key: Optional[str] = "",
        openai_api_type: Optional[str] = None,
        openai_api_version: Optional[str] = None,
        openai_organization: Optional[str] = None,
        openai_proxy: Optional[str] = None,
        request_timeout: Optional[float] = None,
        show_progress_bar: bool = False,
        skip_empty: bool = False,
        tiktoken_enable: bool = True,
        tiktoken_model_name: Optional[str] = None,
    ) -> Union[OpenAIEmbeddings, Callable]:
        # This is to avoid errors with Vector Stores (e.g Chroma)
        if disallowed_special == ["all"]:
            disallowed_special = "all"  # type: ignore

        api_key = SecretStr(openai_api_key) if openai_api_key else None

        return OpenAIEmbeddings(
            tiktoken_enabled=tiktoken_enable,
            default_headers=default_headers,
            default_query=default_query,
            allowed_special=set(allowed_special),
            disallowed_special="all",
            chunk_size=chunk_size,
            client=client,
            deployment=deployment,
            embedding_ctx_length=embedding_ctx_length,
            max_retries=max_retries,
            model=model,
            model_kwargs=model_kwargs,
            base_url=openai_api_base,
            api_key=api_key,
            openai_api_type=openai_api_type,
            api_version=openai_api_version,
            organization=openai_organization,
            openai_proxy=openai_proxy,
            timeout=request_timeout,
            show_progress_bar=show_progress_bar,
            skip_empty=skip_empty,
            tiktoken_model_name=tiktoken_model_name,
        )
code.name: code

code.value:
from axiestudio import CustomComponent
from axiestudio.field_typing import VectorStore, Chain
from langchain.retrievers import EnsembleRetriever


class Component(CustomComponent):
    documentation: str = "http://docs.axiestudio.org/components/custom"
    display_name = "Ensemble Retriever"

    def build(self, semantic_vector_store: VectorStore, lexic_vector_store: VectorStore, k_refs: int=3) -> EnsembleRetriever:
        
        semantic_store_retriever = semantic_vector_store.as_retriever(search_kwargs={"k": k_refs})
        lexic_store_retriever = lexic_vector_store.as_retriever(search_kwargs={"k": k_refs})
        
        ensemble_retriever = EnsembleRetriever(retrievers = [semantic_store_retriever, lexic_store_retriever], weights=[0.5, 0.5],
)

        return ensemble_retriever
code.name: code

template.name: template
template.value:
Always respond in Portuguese.
Always end the response with more than one source documentsi f available: Reference: (URL + Title)
Understand the messages as questions about the subject. 
Provide didactic objective responses to these questions. 
If necessary, use a step-by-step approach.
Anonymize sensitive data, such as addresses, emails, CPFs, and passwords. 
You are responding to questions about the Sankhya ecosystem.
If you come across keywords out of context, understand that they may be specific terms within the ecosystem.
If the keyword is a document identifier, ticket, or service order, provide a brief summary of the content.
Limit yourself to the provided context. If you cannot find the answer within it, apologize.
The content that addresses the question may be distributed (or not) across one or more context passages.

----Conversation History----
{chat_history}
----End History----

----Context----
{context}
----End Context----

User Input:

{question}

input_key.info: The variable to be used as Chat Input when more than one variable is available.

output_key.name: output_key
output_key.info: The variable to be used as Chat Output (e.g. answer in a ConversationalRetrievalChain)

node.description: Buffer for storing conversation memory inside a limited size window.

code.value:
from axiestudio import CustomComponent

from langchain.chains import (
    StuffDocumentsChain, LLMChain, ConversationalRetrievalChain
)
from langchain_core.prompts import PromptTemplate

from typing import Optional, Union, Callable
from axiestudio.field_typing import BaseLanguageModel, BaseMemory, Chain
import logging
logging.basicConfig(level=logging.WARNING)

from langchain_core.retrievers import BaseRetriever
from langchain.chains.conversational_retrieval.prompts import CONDENSE_QUESTION_PROMPT
#from langchain.chains.question_answering import load_qa_chain


class ConversationChainComponent(CustomComponent):
    display_name = "CustomConversationRetrievalChain"
    description = "Chain to have a conversation and load context from memory."

    def build(
        self,
        llm: BaseLanguageModel,
        rephrase_llm:BaseLanguageModel,
        document_prompt:PromptTemplate,
        retriever: BaseRetriever,
        memory: Optional[BaseMemory] = None,
        
    ) -> Union[Chain, Callable]:
        
        if memory:
        
                memory.human_prefix = 'Me'
                memory.ai_prefix = 'You'
        
        stuff_prompt = PromptTemplate(
                input_variables=["page_content", "source", "title"],
                template="""<doc id="context">\n--Source Document--\nURL: {source}\nTítulo: {title}\n--End Source--\n{page_content}"""
            )
    
        
        llm_chain = LLMChain(llm=llm, prompt=document_prompt, return_final_only = False)
        document_variable_name = "context"
        document_separator: str = "\n</doc>"
        sttuf = StuffDocumentsChain(
            llm_chain=llm_chain,
            document_variable_name=document_variable_name,
            document_prompt=stuff_prompt,
        )
 
                    
        question_generator_chain = LLMChain(llm=rephrase_llm, prompt=CONDENSE_QUESTION_PROMPT)
        chain = ConversationalRetrievalChain(
            combine_docs_chain=sttuf,
            retriever=retriever,
            question_generator=question_generator_chain,
            memory = memory,
            rephrase_question = False,
            return_generated_question = False,
            return_source_documents = True
        )
                
        return chain
code.name: code

node.description: Chain to have a conversation and load context from memory.

from typing import Optional, Union

from langchain.llms import BaseLLM
from langchain_community.chat_models.openai import ChatOpenAI

from typing import Optional, Union

from langchain.schema import BaseRetriever
from langchain_community.vectorstores import VectorStore
from langchain_community.vectorstores.qdrant import Qdrant
from axiestudio import CustomComponent
from axiestudio.field_typing import Document, Embeddings, NestedDict
from elasticsearch import Elasticsearch
from langchain_elasticsearch import ElasticsearchStore


class BruceComponent(CustomComponent):
    display_name = "Bruce Inc. Vector Store & Retriever"
    description = "Um retriever diferente"

    def build_config(self):
        return {
            "documents": {"display_name": "Documents"},
            "embedding": {"display_name": "Embedding"},
            "api_key": {"display_name": "API Key", "password": True},
            "host": {"display_name": "Host"},
            "port": {"display_name": "Port"},
            "query_field": {"display_name": "Text Field"},
            "vector_query_field": {"display_name": "Dense Vector Field"}
        }

    def build(
        self,
        embedding: Embeddings,
        vector_query_field:str,
        query_field:str,
        index_name:str,
        documents: Optional[Document] = None,
        api_key: str = None,
        host: str = None,
        port: int = 9200,
        timeout: Optional[int] = 10,
        verify_certs:Optional[bool]=True
    ) -> Union[VectorStore, ElasticsearchStore, BaseRetriever]:

        client = Elasticsearch(
            hosts=f'{host}:{port}', 
            api_key=api_key,
            verify_certs=verify_certs,
            timeout=timeout
            )
        vs = ElasticsearchStore(
                es_connection=client, 
                index_name = index_name,
                embedding=embedding,
                vector_query_field=vector_query_field,
                query_field = query_field,
                strategy=ElasticsearchStore.ApproxRetrievalStrategy(hybrid=False)
                
            )
        return vs

from typing import Any, Callable, Dict, List, Optional, Union

from langchain_openai.embeddings.base import OpenAIEmbeddings
from axiestudio import CustomComponent
from axiestudio.field_typing import NestedDict
from pydantic.v1.types import SecretStr


class OpenAIEmbeddingsComponent(CustomComponent):
    display_name = "OpenAIEmbeddings"
    description = "OpenAI embedding models"

    def build_config(self):
        return {
            "allowed_special": {
                "display_name": "Allowed Special",
                "advanced": True,
                "field_type": "str",
                "is_list": True,
            },
            "default_headers": {
                "display_name": "Default Headers",
                "advanced": True,
                "field_type": "dict",
            },
            "default_query": {
                "display_name": "Default Query",
                "advanced": True,
                "field_type": "NestedDict",
            },
            "disallowed_special": {
                "display_name": "Disallowed Special",
                "advanced": True,
                "field_type": "str",
                "is_list": True,
            },
            "chunk_size": {"display_name": "Chunk Size", "advanced": True},
            "client": {"display_name": "Client", "advanced": True},
            "deployment": {"display_name": "Deployment", "advanced": True},
            "embedding_ctx_length": {
                "display_name": "Embedding Context Length",
                "advanced": True,
            },
            "max_retries": {"display_name": "Max Retries", "advanced": True},
            "model": {
                "display_name": "Model",
                "advanced": False,
                "options": ["text-embedding-3-small", "text-embedding-3-large", "text-embedding-ada-002"],
            },
            "model_kwargs": {"display_name": "Model Kwargs", "advanced": True},
            "openai_api_base": {"display_name": "OpenAI API Base", "password": True, "advanced": True},
            "openai_api_key": {"display_name": "OpenAI API Key", "password": True},
            "openai_api_type": {"display_name": "OpenAI API Type", "advanced": True, "password": True},
            "openai_api_version": {
                "display_name": "OpenAI API Version",
                "advanced": True,
            },
            "openai_organization": {
                "display_name": "OpenAI Organization",
                "advanced": True,
            },
            "openai_proxy": {"display_name": "OpenAI Proxy", "advanced": True},
            "request_timeout": {"display_name": "Request Timeout", "advanced": True},
            "show_progress_bar": {
                "display_name": "Show Progress Bar",
                "advanced": True,
            },
            "skip_empty": {"display_name": "Skip Empty", "advanced": True},
            "tiktoken_model_name": {"display_name": "TikToken Model Name"},
            "tikToken_enable": {"display_name": "TikToken Enable", "advanced": True},
        }

    def build(
        self,
        default_headers: Optional[Dict[str, str]] = None,
        default_query: Optional[NestedDict] = {},
        allowed_special: List[str] = [],
        disallowed_special: List[str] = ["all"],
        chunk_size: int = 1000,
        client: Optional[Any] = None,
        deployment: str = "text-embedding-3-small",
        embedding_ctx_length: int = 8191,
        max_retries: int = 6,
        model: str = "text-embedding-3-small",
        model_kwargs: NestedDict = {},
        openai_api_base: Optional[str] = None,
        openai_api_key: Optional[str] = "",
        openai_api_type: Optional[str] = None,
        openai_api_version: Optional[str] = None,
        openai_organization: Optional[str] = None,
        openai_proxy: Optional[str] = None,
        request_timeout: Optional[float] = None,
        show_progress_bar: bool = False,
        skip_empty: bool = False,
        tiktoken_enable: bool = True,
        tiktoken_model_name: Optional[str] = None,
    ) -> Union[OpenAIEmbeddings, Callable]:
        # This is to avoid errors with Vector Stores (e.g Chroma)
        if disallowed_special == ["all"]:
            disallowed_special = "all"  # type: ignore

        api_key = SecretStr(openai_api_key) if openai_api_key else None

        return OpenAIEmbeddings(
            tiktoken_enabled=tiktoken_enable,
            default_headers=default_headers,
            default_query=default_query,
            allowed_special=set(allowed_special),
            disallowed_special="all",
            chunk_size=chunk_size,
            client=client,
            deployment=deployment,
            embedding_ctx_length=embedding_ctx_length,
            max_retries=max_retries,
            model=model,
            model_kwargs=model_kwargs,
            base_url=openai_api_base,
            api_key=api_key,
            openai_api_type=openai_api_type,
            api_version=openai_api_version,
            organization=openai_organization,
            openai_proxy=openai_proxy,
            timeout=request_timeout,
            show_progress_bar=show_progress_bar,
            skip_empty=skip_empty,
            tiktoken_model_name=tiktoken_model_name,
        )

code.value:
from axiestudio import CustomComponent
from axiestudio.field_typing import VectorStore, Chain
from langchain.retrievers import EnsembleRetriever


class Component(CustomComponent):
    documentation: str = "http://docs.axiestudio.org/components/custom"
    display_name = "Ensemble Retriever"

    def build(self, semantic_vector_store: VectorStore, lexic_vector_store: VectorStore, k_refs: int=3) -> EnsembleRetriever:
        
        semantic_store_retriever = semantic_vector_store.as_retriever(search_kwargs={"k": k_refs})
        lexic_store_retriever = lexic_vector_store.as_retriever(search_kwargs={"k": k_refs})
        
        ensemble_retriever = EnsembleRetriever(retrievers = [semantic_store_retriever, lexic_store_retriever], weights=[0.5, 0.5],
)

        return ensemble_retriever

template.name: template
template.value:
Always respond in Portuguese.
Always end the response with more than one source documentsi f available: Reference: (URL + Title)
Understand the messages as questions about the subject. 
Provide didactic objective responses to these questions. 
If necessary, use a step-by-step approach.
Anonymize sensitive data, such as addresses, emails, CPFs, and passwords. 
You are responding to questions about the Sankhya ecosystem.
If you come across keywords out of context, understand that they may be specific terms within the ecosystem.
If the keyword is a document identifier, ticket, or service order, provide a brief summary of the content.
Limit yourself to the provided context. If you cannot find the answer within it, apologize.
The content that addresses the question may be distributed (or not) across one or more context passages.

----Conversation History----
{chat_history}
----End History----

----Context----
{context}
----End Context----

User Input:

{question}

code.value:
from axiestudio import CustomComponent

from langchain.chains import (
    StuffDocumentsChain, LLMChain, ConversationalRetrievalChain
)
from langchain_core.prompts import PromptTemplate

from typing import Optional, Union, Callable
from axiestudio.field_typing import BaseLanguageModel, BaseMemory, Chain
import logging
logging.basicConfig(level=logging.WARNING)

from langchain_core.retrievers import BaseRetriever
from langchain.chains.conversational_retrieval.prompts import CONDENSE_QUESTION_PROMPT
#from langchain.chains.question_answering import load_qa_chain


class ConversationChainComponent(CustomComponent):
    display_name = "CustomConversationRetrievalChain"
    description = "Chain to have a conversation and load context from memory."

    def build(
        self,
        llm: BaseLanguageModel,
        rephrase_llm:BaseLanguageModel,
        document_prompt:PromptTemplate,
        retriever: BaseRetriever,
        memory: Optional[BaseMemory] = None,
        
    ) -> Union[Chain, Callable]:
        
        if memory:
        
                memory.human_prefix = 'Me'
                memory.ai_prefix = 'You'
        
        stuff_prompt = PromptTemplate(
                input_variables=["page_content", "source", "title"],
                template="""<doc id="context">\n--Source Document--\nURL: {source}\nTítulo: {title}\n--End Source--\n{page_content}"""
            )
    
        
        llm_chain = LLMChain(llm=llm, prompt=document_prompt, return_final_only = False)
        document_variable_name = "context"
        document_separator: str = "\n</doc>"
        sttuf = StuffDocumentsChain(
            llm_chain=llm_chain,
            document_variable_name=document_variable_name,
            document_prompt=stuff_prompt,
        )
 
                    
        question_generator_chain = LLMChain(llm=rephrase_llm, prompt=CONDENSE_QUESTION_PROMPT)
        chain = ConversationalRetrievalChain(
            combine_docs_chain=sttuf,
            retriever=retriever,
            question_generator=question_generator_chain,
            memory = memory,
            rephrase_question = False,
            return_generated_question = False,
            return_source_documents = True
        )
                
        return chain

from typing import Optional, Union

from langchain.llms import BaseLLM
from langchain_community.chat_models.openai import ChatOpenAI

from axiestudio import CustomComponent
from axiestudio.field_typing import BaseLanguageModel, NestedDict


class ChatOpenAIComponent(CustomComponent):
    display_name = "ChatOpenAI"
    description = "`OpenAI` Chat large language models API."

    def build_config(self):
        return {
            "max_tokens": {
                "display_name": "Max Tokens",
                "field_type": "int",
                "advanced": False,
                "required": False,
            },
            "model_kwargs": {
                "display_name": "Model Kwargs",
                "field_type": "NestedDict",
                "advanced": True,
                "required": False,
            },
            "model_name": {
                "display_name": "Model Name",
                "field_type": "str",
                "advanced": False,
                "required": False,
                "options": [
                    "gpt-4-turbo-preview",
                    "gpt-4-0125-preview",
                    "gpt-4-1106-preview",
                    "gpt-4-vision-preview",
                    "gpt-3.5-turbo-0125",
                    "gpt-3.5-turbo-1106",
                ],
            },
            "openai_api_base": {
                "display_name": "OpenAI API Base",
                "field_type": "str",
                "advanced": False,
                "required": False,
                "info": (
                    "The base URL of the OpenAI API. Defaults to https://api.openai.com/v1.\n\n"
                    "You can change this to use other APIs like JinaChat, LocalAI and Prem."
                ),
            },
            "openai_api_key": {
                "display_name": "OpenAI API Key",
                "field_type": "str",
                "advanced": False,
                "required": False,
                "password": True,
            },
            "temperature": {
                "display_name": "Temperature",
                "field_type": "float",
                "advanced": False,
                "required": False,
                "value": 0.7,
            },
        }

    def build(
        self,
        max_tokens: Optional[int] = 256,
        model_kwargs: NestedDict = {},
        model_name: str = "gpt-4-1106-preview",
        openai_api_base: Optional[str] = None,
        openai_api_key: Optional[str] = None,
        temperature: float = 0.7,
    ) -> Union[BaseLanguageModel, BaseLLM]:
        if not openai_api_base:
            openai_api_base = "https://api.openai.com/v1"
        return ChatOpenAI(
            max_tokens=max_tokens,
            model_kwargs=model_kwargs,
            model=model_name,
            base_url=openai_api_base,
            api_key=openai_api_key,
            temperature=temperature,
            streaming=False
        )
